creator: dirks@idealsystems.be
text:
hello,

I successfully compiled the InstallBin project from the sources of httpd-2.2.0-
win32-src-rev2.zip (downloaded from the apache download site)

but when I look into the /bin directory, there is no apache.exe

I also validated a 2.0.55 source and there the Apache.dsp is included in the 
zup file, so I think that the Apache.dsp is missing in the sources of the 
httpd2.2 release (and perhaps some other files as well)

can you assist on this?

grd.
The program is now (with release 2.2) named httpd[.exe] just as on Unix.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
